title: My Room
subtle: Realistic (fiction), 32 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile BR20L
description: The familiar setting of a child's bedroom puts readers at ease as they read new vocabulary naming the objects they find in their own rooms. Students will learn to link pictures they recognize with unfamiliar words.
meta: bed, books, clothes, desk, fish, room, shoes, toys,
Connect to prior knowledge to make meaning from text
Compare and Contrast : Compare and contrast information
Initial Consonants : Discriminate initial consonant /r/ sound

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
